SCTX - Script Source:
ScriptName fbmwTGAdvancementQuestScript


; For the purposes of determining Skills in this Script, the Secondary Skills are ignored.  They are a joke and not worth the added complexity

; 0 = Toad			    0 ThiefReputation,	Personality 30, Agility 30
; 1 = Wet Ear		    5 ThiefReputation,	Personality 30, Agility 30, One Skill at 10
; 2 = Footpad		  10 ThiefReputation,	Personality 30, Agility 30, One Skill at 20
; 3 = Blackcap		  20 ThiefReputation,	Personality 30, Agility 30, One Skill at 30 + Two Skills at   5
; 4 = Operative		  30 ThiefReputation,	Personality 30, Agility 30, One Skill at 40 + Two Skills at 10
; 5 = Bandit			  45 ThiefReputation,	Personality 31, Agility 31, One Skill at 50 + Two Skills at 15
; 6 = Captain		  60 ThiefReputation,	Personality 32, Agility 32, One Skill at 60 + Two Skills at 20
; 7 = Ringleader	  80 ThiefReputation,	Personality 33, Agility 33, One Skill at 70 + Two Skills at 25
; 8 = Mastermind	100 ThiefReputation,	Personality 34, Agility 34, One Skill at 80 + Two Skills at 30
; 9 = Master Thief	125 ThiefReputation,	Personality 35, Agility 35, One Skill at 90 + Two Skills at 35

; Thief  = Marksman, Security, Acrobatics, Sneak, Blade, LightArmor

SHORT ThiefAdvancement
; 0 = Nothing Qualifies
; 1 = Skills Qualify; Reputation Does Not
; 2 = Reputation Qualifies, but Skills do Not
; 3 = Qualified For Advancement
; 4 = Script Needs To Set Next Rank
; 5 = No More Advancement

SHORT ThiefReputation

SHORT QualifyReputation
SHORT QualifySkills

short ExpCount
short Fine



BEGIN GameMode

	if PlayerInMorrowind == 0
		return	;there really is no need to run this in Cyrodiil
	endif

	If Player.GetInFaction 0ThievesSGuild == 0
		return
	endif

;This part of the script handles expulsion

	If Player.GetInFaction 0ThievesSGuild

		If GetPCFactionSteal 0ThievesSGuild
			if eval (Call mwGetFactionWitnessesFunc 0ThievesSGuild)
				SetPCExpelled 0ThievesSGuild 1
				MessageBox "You have been expelled from Thieves Guild."
				AddTopic 1makeSamends
			else
				SetPCFactionSteal 0ThievesSGuild 0
			endif
		EndIf

		If GetPCFactionAttack 0ThievesSGuild
			if eval (Call mwGetFactionWitnessesFunc 0ThievesSGuild)
				SetPCExpelled 0ThievesSGuild 1
				MessageBox "You have been expelled from Thieves Guild."
				AddTopic 1makeSamends
			else
				SetPCFactionAttack 0ThievesSGuild 0
			endif
		EndIf

	EndIf

;The rest of the script below handles skill checks and advancement

	SET QualifyReputation TO 0
	SET QualifySkills TO 0

	IF ThiefAdvancement == 4 ; Need To Set Next Rank
		IF GetStage fbmwTGAdvancement == 10
			SetStage fbmwTGAdvancement 11
		ELSEIF GetStage fbmwTGAdvancement == 20
			SetStage fbmwTGAdvancement 21
		ELSEIF GetStage fbmwTGAdvancement == 30
			SetStage fbmwTGAdvancement 31
		ELSEIF GetStage fbmwTGAdvancement == 40
			SetStage fbmwTGAdvancement 41
		ELSEIF GetStage fbmwTGAdvancement == 50
			SetStage fbmwTGAdvancement 51
		ELSEIF GetStage fbmwTGAdvancement == 60
			SetStage fbmwTGAdvancement 61
		ELSEIF GetStage fbmwTGAdvancement == 70
			SetStage fbmwTGAdvancement 71
		ELSEIF GetStage fbmwTGAdvancement == 80
			SetStage fbmwTGAdvancement 81
		ELSEIF GetStage fbmwTGAdvancement == 90
			SetStage fbmwTGAdvancement 91
			SET ThiefAdvancement TO 5
			RETURN
		ENDIF

		SET ThiefAdvancement TO 0
		RETURN
	ENDIF ; ThiefAdvancement == 4

	IF ThiefAdvancement == 3 || ThiefAdvancement == 5
		RETURN
	ENDIF



	IF GetStage fbmwTGAdvancement < 10 && Player.GetFactionRank 0ThievesSGuild == 0
		IF ThiefReputation >= 5
			SET QualifyReputation TO 1 ; Reputation Qualifies
		ENDIF

		IF Player.GetAV Marksman >= 10 || Player.GetAV Acrobatics >= 10 || Player.GetAV Blade >= 10 || Player.GetAV Security >= 10 || Player.GetAV Sneak >= 10 || Player.GetAV LightArmor >= 10
			SET QualifySkills TO 1 ; Skills Qualify
		ENDIF

		IF QualifySkills == 1 && QualifyReputation == 1
			SetStage fbmwTGAdvancement 10
			SET ThiefAdvancement TO 3
			AddTopic 1Advancement
		ENDIF

	ELSEIF GetStage fbmwTGAdvancement < 20 && Player.GetFactionRank 0ThievesSGuild == 1
		IF ThiefReputation >= 10
			SET QualifyReputation TO 1 ; Reputation Qualifies
		ENDIF

		IF Player.GetAV Personality >= 30 && Player.GetAV Agility >= 30
			IF Player.GetAV Marksman >= 20 || Player.GetAV Acrobatics >= 20 || Player.GetAV Blade >= 20 || Player.GetAV Security >= 20 || Player.GetAV Sneak >= 20 || Player.GetAV LightArmor >= 20
				SET QualifySkills TO 1 ; Skills Qualify
			ENDIF
		ENDIF

		IF  QualifySkills == 1 && QualifyReputation == 1
			SetStage fbmwTGAdvancement 20
			SET ThiefAdvancement TO 3
			AddTopic 1Advancement
		ENDIF

	ELSEIF GetStage fbmwTGAdvancement < 30 && Player.GetFactionRank 0ThievesSGuild == 2
		IF ThiefReputation >= 20
			SET QualifyReputation TO 1 ; Reputation Qualifies
		ENDIF

		IF Player.GetAV Personality >= 30 && Player.GetAV Agility >= 30
			IF Player.GetAV Marksman >= 30 || Player.GetAV Acrobatics >= 30 || Player.GetAV Blade >= 30 || Player.GetAV Security >= 30 || Player.GetAV Sneak >= 30 || Player.GetAV LightArmor >= 30
				SET QualifySkills TO 1 ; Skills Qualify
			ENDIF
		ENDIF

		IF  QualifySkills == 1 && QualifyReputation == 1
			SetStage fbmwTGAdvancement 30
			SET ThiefAdvancement TO 3
			AddTopic 1Advancement
		ENDIF

	ELSEIF GetStage fbmwTGAdvancement < 40 && Player.GetFactionRank 0ThievesSGuild == 3
		IF ThiefReputation >= 30
			SET QualifyReputation TO 1 ; Reputation Qualifies
		ENDIF

		IF Player.GetAV Personality >= 30 && Player.GetAV Agility >= 30
			IF Player.GetAV Marksman >= 40 || Player.GetAV Acrobatics >= 40 || Player.GetAV Blade >= 40 || Player.GetAV Security >= 40 || Player.GetAV Sneak >= 40 || Player.GetAV LightArmor >= 40
				SET QualifySkills TO 1 ; Skills Qualify
			ENDIF
		ENDIF

		IF  QualifySkills == 1 && QualifyReputation == 1
			SetStage fbmwTGAdvancement 40
			SET ThiefAdvancement TO 3
			AddTopic 1Advancement
		ENDIF

	ELSEIF GetStage fbmwTGAdvancement < 50 && Player.GetFactionRank 0ThievesSGuild == 4
		IF ThiefReputation >= 45
			SET QualifyReputation TO 1 ; Reputation Qualifies
		ENDIF

		IF Player.GetAV Personality >= 31 && Player.GetAV Agility >= 31
			IF Player.GetAV Marksman >= 50 || Player.GetAV Acrobatics >= 50 || Player.GetAV Blade >= 50 || Player.GetAV Security >= 50 || Player.GetAV Sneak >= 50 || Player.GetAV LightArmor >= 50
				SET QualifySkills TO 1 ; Skills Qualify
			ENDIF
		ENDIF

		IF  QualifySkills == 1 && QualifyReputation == 1
			SetStage fbmwTGAdvancement 50
			SET ThiefAdvancement TO 3
			AddTopic 1Advancement
		ENDIF

	ELSEIF GetStage fbmwTGAdvancement < 60 && Player.GetFactionRank 0ThievesSGuild == 5
		IF ThiefReputation >= 60
			SET QualifyReputation TO 1 ; Reputation Qualifies
		ENDIF

		IF Player.GetAV Personality >= 32 && Player.GetAV Agility >= 32
			IF Player.GetAV Marksman >= 60 || Player.GetAV Acrobatics >= 60 || Player.GetAV Blade >= 60 || Player.GetAV Security >= 60 || Player.GetAV Sneak >= 60 || Player.GetAV LightArmor >= 60
				SET QualifySkills TO 1 ; Skills Qualify
			ENDIF
		ENDIF

		IF  QualifySkills == 1 && QualifyReputation == 1
			SetStage fbmwTGAdvancement 60
			SET ThiefAdvancement TO 3
			AddTopic 1Advancement
		ENDIF

	ELSEIF GetStage fbmwTGAdvancement < 70 && Player.GetFactionRank 0ThievesSGuild == 6
		IF ThiefReputation >= 80
			SET QualifyReputation TO 1 ; Reputation Qualifies
		ENDIF

		IF Player.GetAV Personality >= 33 && Player.GetAV Agility >= 33
			IF Player.GetAV Marksman >= 70 || Player.GetAV Acrobatics >= 70 || Player.GetAV Blade >= 70 || Player.GetAV Security >= 70 || Player.GetAV Sneak >= 70 || Player.GetAV LightArmor >= 70
				SET QualifySkills TO 1 ; Skills Qualify
			ENDIF
		ENDIF

		IF  QualifySkills == 1 && QualifyReputation == 1
			SetStage fbmwTGAdvancement 70
			SET ThiefAdvancement TO 3
			AddTopic 1Advancement
		ENDIF

	ELSEIF GetStage fbmwTGAdvancement < 80 && Player.GetFactionRank 0ThievesSGuild == 7
		IF ThiefReputation >= 100
			SET QualifyReputation TO 1 ; Reputation Qualifies
		ENDIF

		IF Player.GetAV Personality >= 34 && Player.GetAV Agility >= 34
			IF Player.GetAV Marksman >= 80 || Player.GetAV Acrobatics >= 80 || Player.GetAV Blade >= 80 || Player.GetAV Security >= 80 || Player.GetAV Sneak >= 80 || Player.GetAV LightArmor >= 80
				SET QualifySkills TO 1 ; Skills Qualify
			ENDIF
		ENDIF

		IF  QualifySkills == 1 && QualifyReputation == 1
			SetStage fbmwTGAdvancement 80
			SET ThiefAdvancement TO 3
			AddTopic 1Advancement
		ENDIF

	ELSEIF GetStage fbmwTGAdvancement < 90 && Player.GetFactionRank 0ThievesSGuild == 8
		IF ThiefReputation >= 125
			SET QualifyReputation TO 1 ; Reputation Qualifies
		ENDIF

		IF Player.GetAV Personality >= 35 && Player.GetAV Agility >= 35
			IF Player.GetAV Marksman >= 90 || Player.GetAV Acrobatics >= 90 || Player.GetAV Blade >= 90 || Player.GetAV Security >= 90 || Player.GetAV Sneak >= 90 || Player.GetAV LightArmor >= 90
				SET QualifySkills TO 1 ; Skills Qualify
			ENDIF
		ENDIF

		IF  QualifySkills == 1 && QualifyReputation == 1
			SetStage fbmwTGAdvancement 90
			SET ThiefAdvancement TO 3
			AddTopic 1Advancement
		ENDIF

	ENDIF


; 1 = Skills Qualify; Reputation Does Not
; 2 = Reputation Qualifies, but Skills do Not

	IF QualifySkills == 0 && QualifyReputation == 0
		SET ThiefAdvancement TO 0
	ELSEIF  QualifySkills == 1 && QualifyReputation == 0
		SET ThiefAdvancement TO 1
	ELSEIF  QualifySkills == 0 && QualifyReputation == 1
		SET ThiefAdvancement TO 2
	ENDIF
END
;<CSEBlock>
;<CSECaretPos> 2094 </CSECaretPos>
;</CSEBlock>

SLSD - Local Variable Data.Unused: CD CD CD CD CD CD CD
